summary: Completed frontend testing of shipping functionality. Found critical cart integration issue preventing full end-to-end testing. Shipping calculator implementation is correct but cart functionality is not working properly.

critical_bugs.issue: Add to Cart buttons not working - items not being added to cart state
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents testing of shipping display and checkout flow
critical_bugs.symptoms: Cart shows empty even after clicking Add to Cart buttons

integration_issues.issue: Cart context not receiving items when Add to Cart is clicked
integration_issues.symptoms: No cart count indicator, no notifications on add to cart

ui_bugs.issue: Products showing skeleton loaders indefinitely on some loads

passed_tests: Add to Cart buttons are visible and clickable
Shipping calculator utility functions are implemented correctly
Weight property added to all products (50g-300g range)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix cart functionality - Add to Cart buttons are not adding items to cart state. This prevents testing of shipping display, weight breakdown, free shipping badges, and checkout flow. Need to debug cart context integration and ensure items are properly added when clicking Add to Cart buttons.

success_percentage.frontend: 30% - Core shipping logic implemented but cart integration broken
